column2: Partly cloudy. mallard nest north shore- 2 geese close by.
Pollen floating on water- no wind. lake smooth.
SE wind 10 mph. lake about 20" low. lake churned up from skiers.
Calm. 78 geese on north shore. lake down about 2.5'.
Southeast wind at 5-10 mph and the lake is very quiet.
South wind at 0-5 mph- hazy and hot with a temperature of 85 degrees- little pollen in the water- and nobody on the lake but us.
Southeast wind- a lot of action on the lake all week and got weeds all chewed up.
South wind at 5-10 mph- sun shinning and lake is very quiet- we were the only one on the lake.
Partly cloudy- NNW wind 5 mph. 6 fishing boats on lake
Clear- light SE wind. 4 fishing boats on lake
Sunny afternoon- light breeze. No other boats on lake.
Cloudy and clod- 25 F. No wind- snow around edge of lake. No boats on lake.
Cloudy skies. No wind. Nobody on lake.
Partly cloudy- wind SE 5-10 mph. 5 fishing boats on lake.
Clear afternoon. 55 degrees F- no wind.
Wind out of NW - overcast clouds
Cloudy- light wind out of SE.  Temp. 59 F.  No one on lake.
Wind out of the East- water calm- lots of pollen on water.
sunny and no wind- 7 B. W. fishermen
Weather was cloudy- cool.  Loons on the lake.

column1: Much activity on the lakes - boats stirring up sediment
